title: anyone know of a good game other than league?
body: just want something to do when im not no lifing ranked :P

replies.body:
Popular casual browser game with a decent community? Flight Rising. It's all about collecting and breeding dragons, but goals are really only limited to users' imagination. It's open for registration now and for a few more days. 

Though most people who play League probably won't cohere very well to the pet-breeding browser game niche as the two belong to very different worlds of games, there's always a chance you're an oddity like me. o.o

If you're looking for RPGs I'd recommend Dragon's Dogma. If you're just looking for fun time killers...something like Slime Rancher maybe. That's just off the top of my head, you don't mention genre at all so it's hard to know what you're looking for. There's all the usual suspects like Bethesda games, and if you're looking for MMOs I can recommend ESO, I've heard Destiny has picked up a lot too (though I haven't played it myself, same deal for FFXIV, Tera etc).

do you want a f2p game or does it not matter?
also what kind of game?

Vainglory! iOS and Android compatible. However only them, no pc
